item.title: Reeves backs off from proposals to raise income tax rates at Budget
item.description: The chancellor had been widely expected to increase income tax rates, which would have broken a manifesto promise.

item.title: Fly-tippers bury field in mountain of waste
item.description: The enormous pile of rubbish is called an "environmental catastrophe unfolding in plain sight".

item.title: Freed British-Egyptian activist not allowed to fly to UK, family says
item.description: Mr Abdel Fattah was Egypt's best known political prisoner until seven weeks ago, when he was released from jail.

item.title: Doctors harming patients by striking, says health secretary
item.description: Doctors on strike for 13th time in a long-running pay dispute "completely irresponsible", says Wes Streeing.

item.title: Amber warnings issued as Storm Claudia brings heavy rain and flooding to UK
item.description: Storm Claudia will bring heavy and persistent rain to parts of the UK on Friday. Amber warnings have been issued and there is a risk of flooding and d...
